intro_text:
I am currently an university undergraduate student. This homepage website gives navigation to tool applications such as network disks and Wiki.

All in-site applications are deployed on my personal server. Most of them are derived from open-source projects and made available on the public network. Therefore, their addresses may change. You can bookmark this address release page to obtain the latest URLs for learning and reference purposes.

External services mainly display some precious resources. Their content may be modified without our notice. This website does not guarantee the accuracy of the content; please verify it independently.
